case_circumstances: Body was found in a covered cistern/well.  Decomposition precluded recognizable facial features.  Two rubber bands were around left wrist and one around right wrist.  Living weight was estimated at 130-150 by Lawrence County officials.
case_body_hair: Some pubic hair remained attached to the body.
case_eye_description: Decomposition precludes accurate assessment of eye color.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: There was a dark pullover sweater over the upper body, covered with a lightweight shirt.  On top of all this was a heavy red cable-knit sweater.  The individual was wearing gray slacks.  On the right foot was an inner light-colored lightweight sock, covered by a heavyweight red sock.  The left foot had only the inner light-colored lightweight sock on it, though the cuff of the red sock was still present.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
